tooltips.epidemicType: Choose the type of epidemic from the drop-down list.
tooltips.totalCases: The total number of reported cases.
tooltips.cercles: The cercle(s) in which the epidemic occured. Is automatically filled in once the commune is selected.
tooltips.regions: The region(s) in which the epidemic occured. Is automatically filled in once the commune is selected.
tooltips.communes: The commune(s) in which the epidemic occurred. You can select more than one commune. Mandatory field.
tooltips.startDate: The date the epidemic started (first case detected).
tooltips.branches: Branches involved in activities for the epidemic.
